title: I purchased 4 chests, one of which contained Ornn. Ornn is gone now.
body:
Here is my current ticket with Riot support. Anybody at Riot browsing the forums right now? This is turning out to be such a frustrating experience for me and I don't know what to do.

___

From 13:21 today:

Hey there,

I just purchased 4 chests and opened them, and was pleasantly surprised when I found an Ornn Champion Shard. There are only 7 Champions I don't have in League and I was ecstatic. I clicked the Ornn shard, then clicked Home to check something else. I then went back to my Loot--and Ornn was gone. I am so frustrated right now and I have no idea what happened. Can I please get the Ornn Champion Shard back? He's one of the only Champions I actually want that I don't have besides Kayn and I am so disappointed right now. I NEVER clicked anything to deconstruct him for Blue Essence.

From 15:25 today:

Okay, now I am even more confused. I just looked in my Loot and found a Kayn shard there. That's all well and good, but where is Ornn?

___

So that's my current situation.

replies.body:
Hmmmm strange. I'm looking over your loot history right now, and those 4 hextech chests gave you a Kayn Shard, a Shaco Shard, an Arcade Ezreal Skin Shard, and the Mechs vs Minions Ward.

If you did in fact see an Ornn shard, that must have been weird visual bug.
I am 100% sure it was Ornn. Is anything going to be done about this?
Also, it's worth mentioning that after Ornn disappeared, there was a Champion Shard missing from my inventory. Kayn only appeared in my Loot hours after the fact.

Just re-rolled three of the Shards (not Kayn--I still have that one because I'd rather have Ornn) and got Rek'Sai.

Broporo, I'm not trying to be rude, but I'm having a lousy day and I know you're a busy person but if you could please get back to me I'd appreciate it. Thank you.

No worries man, I completely understand this frustration and nobody is trying to call you some kind of liar that's for sure. We're looking at our tools on the backend and it's showing all of the content you received from those orbs. Like I said before, you **may** have actually seen Ornn, but that would have been a bug since the system itself doesn't show Ornn coming from those orbs. 

With that being said, we're more than happy to help if our system is wrong. But in order to prove to those agents that what they're seeing is wrong I'll need to have some kind of screenshot to show them proof =\ .
Thanks for being cool about this. The irony of this? I was going to screenshot it (because the odds of getting an Ornn Shard are pretty small) when I first saw it but for some reason I didn't.

Another update and the final update for this thread: I just re-rolled three more Champion Shards and happened to get Ornn. While I'm glad, I'm still miffed that Riot basically called me a liar and didn't care.

Apparently Riot doesn't care:

"JENNY711
Today at 17:40
Hey there,

I'm not seeing you ever opened Ornn. I am, however, seeing you did open Kayn when you opened 4 chests. Sorry for the confusion.

I hope this clears things up. Let me know if you have any other questions.

Jenny711
Player Support Specialist
"Let my blade speak the law""
